objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Drama themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Drama narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Drama lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dramatic conflict or emotional crisis involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a drama context
Students engage in drama themed role-play about technology in daily life using informal register
Students create original drama themed content about technology in daily life in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Drama scenario?
What conflict or tension might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Drama story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Drama perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this drama scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Drama situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using informal register in drama context
Character B: Responding in informal register within drama theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with conflict
technology in daily life with tension
technology in daily life with struggle

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Drama theme: Intense emotions, conflicts, life challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Drama themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
